@@ -33,0 +33,18 @@
+/*
+ * @test id=Serial
+ * @requires vm.gc.Serial
+ * @bug     8368527
+ * @summary Stress MemoryMXBean.getTotalGcCpuTime during shutdown
+ * @library /test/lib
+ * @run main/othervm -XX:+UseSerialGC TestGetTotalGcCpuTime
+ */
+
+/*

+ * @summary Stress MemoryMXBean.getTotalGcCpuTime during shutdown
+ * @library /test/lib
+ * @run main/othervm -XX:+UseParallelGC TestGetTotalGcCpuTime
+ */
+
